name: Andy Cockburn
content: Computer Science and Software Engineering | University of Canterbury Skip to main content Use the Tab and Up, Down arrow keys to select menu items. Andy Cockburn Position and Qualifications Professor, B.Sc. (Hons), Ph.D. Contact Details Room: Erskine Building 313 Phone: +64 3 369 2119 (internal 92119) andy.cockburn@canterbury.ac.nz Undergraduate and Graduate Courses I'm working half time in 2023. Research Interests My research interests are in human-computer interaction (HCI). I currently head the Canterbury HCI research group. Current projects and publications Recent Editorial and Conference Roles Editorial Board Member: ACM Transactions on Human-Computer Interaction, Human-Computer Interaction Journal, and Foundations and Trends in Human-Computer Interaction. Technical Program Co-Chair for ACM CHI2020: Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems Member CHI Steering Committee Back to top
